name: Z Planes - Zombie World at War
name_original: Z Planes - Zombie World at War
description:
The apocalypse has happened! The remaining survivors are zombies! It’s an insane battle between the Blue and Red forces. Who will win? It’s crazy fun!!

Shoot down the Red Forces aircraft. They come out of nowhere and their speed increases. Gather gold and silver coins to earn new characters and airplanes.

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Z Planes’ Now!!!
